title: 如何修改领地插件圈地的最大面积？？？
author: rrppgg

replies.txt_content:
jiuerd 发表于 2014-7-8 12:13
http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=redirect&goto=findpost&ptid=294094&pid=5633686
Residence 插件里面有设置Config
打开文件后更改
# The maximum number of blocks a Residence can be, East to West (X).
MaxEastWest: 16
# The maximum number of blocks a Residence can be, North to South (Z).
MaxNorthSouth: 16
# The maximum number of blocks a Residence can be, High to Low (Y).
MaxUpDown: 256
把数字改成你想要的

Residence 插件里面有设置Config
打开文件后更改
# The maximum number of blocks a Residence can be, East to West (X).
MaxEastWest: 16
# The maximum number of blocks a Residence can be, North to South (Z).
MaxNorthSouth: 16
# The maximum number of blocks a Residence can be, High to Low (Y).
MaxUpDown: 256
把数字改成你想要的
